transcript.text:
Hello, and welcome to Your Bank Transaction Assistant service. I'm here to help you with any transaction queries, resolve merchant confusion, and assist with disputes, fraud concerns, or gambling-related issues.

Before we proceed, for security purposes,I need to verify your identity. Could you please provide your Account Number and Sort Code? This will allow me to access your account details securely and assist you effectively.

Once you share those details, I'll immediately begin the verification process and thenwe can address any questions or concerns you may have regarding your transactions or account.
I can help you check your balance, but first I need to verify your identity for security reasons. Please provide your Account Number and Sort Code so I can access your account details.
